bibl.title: Further Unnoticed Points in the Text of the New Testament. [Edited by J.K. ELLIOTT.]
bibl.note: 18 notes de critique textuelle. Se réfère en part. à: P. Chester Beatty I et II (= van Haelst 371 et 497); P. Bodmer II; XIV; XVII (= van Haelst 426; 406; 470).
ROSS J.M. †, Further Unnoticed Points in the Text of the New Testament. [Edited by J.K. ELLIOTT.]
